title: Pendant, "Locket in the form of a heart", ca. 1850
creditline: Gift of Charlotte Y. Salisbury in loving memory of her husband, Harrison E. Salisbury
description: Heart-shaped, enameled red, with pearl and small diamonds at center; on back side a circular locket compartment; loop and ring with three pearlsat top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pendant, "Locket in the form of a heart", ca. 1850.
ca. 1850. Gold, silver, enamel, pearls, diamonds. Gift of Charlotte Y. Salisbury in loving memory of her husband, Harrison E. Salisbury. 1995-15-4.
